title: Cards of Love: The Sun
description: The cliche in love stories is that the good little rich girl falls for the poor bad boy with tattoos. The glamorous prom queen gets knocked-up by the swoon-worthy tattooed god who smells of leather and exhaust from his motorcycle.That is not how this story goes.Elias Black may have had a sleeve of tattoos and grown up on the wrong side of the tracks, but he didnâ€™t have a true bad bone in his body.Until he fell for me. Then he was terribly bad.
author: Stevie J. Cole
